briefdescription.para: Populate atoms and bonds from SMILES.

detaileddescription.para:
Populate atoms and bonds from SMILES. This uses the RDKit backend.
smiles
SMILES string
seed
RNG seed
whether the parsing and initial conformer generation was successful.
populateFromPDB()

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &filename, const std::string &smiles_hint="", unsigned int seed=36754, std::vector< std::shared_ptr< InputPostProcessor::InputPostProcessor > > postProcessors={})
memberdef.name: populateFromPDB

briefdescription.para: Populate atoms and bonds from a PDB file. Additionally, a SMILES string can be used for bond order hint.

detaileddescription.para: Due to limitation of the PDB file format, it is difficult to infer bond order (single/double/aromatic bond) from connectivity data. The underlying implementation in RDKit does not attempts it. A SMILES string with the correct aromaticity/bonds can be supplied to help obtain accurate internal representation.
Only the first model and first chain of the PDB file is used to construct the molecule.

Populate atoms and bonds from SMILES. This uses the RDKit backend.
filename
Path to PDB file
smiles_hint
SMILES for the loaded molecule. If none available, use the empty string.
whether the parsing and initial conformer generation was successful.
populateFromSMILES()

briefdescription.para: Return the number of atom in the Molecule, Hydrogen excepted.
Return the number of bonds in the Molecule.
Obtain the conformer that was either loaded from file or generated when populating the Molecule.

detaileddescription.para: If the Molecule was loaded from a file format containing coordinate (PDB, ...), the initial conformer has those coordinate. Otherwise, it is a RDKit generated conformer.

parameterdescription.para: If true, gives the coordinates with the molecule centroid as 0,0,0. This is useful for easier application of rotation

briefdescription.para: Generate a conformer of this molecule.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to conformer object to be filled. Not modified if generation fails.
If true, gives the coordinates with the molecule centroid as 0,0,0. This is useful for easier application of rotation

simplesect.para: Returns true if successfully generated conformer, false otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< iConformer > &viConformers, unsigned int num, bool centroidNormalization=false, int seed=367454)
memberdef.name: generateConformers

briefdescription.para: Generate a vector of conformer of this molecule.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to vector to be filled with conformer. May already contain something.
Number of conformers to attempt to generate.
If true, gives the coordinates with the molecule centroid as 0,0,0. This is useful for easier application of rotation

simplesect.para: Returns the number of conformer actually generated. May be 0.

briefdescription.para: Get the 3-letter residue code used for this molecule in PDB file.
Set the 3-letter residue code used for this molecule in PDB file.

parameterdescription.para: Residue name. Characters beyond the first three are ignored.

briefdescription.para: Make a copy of the Molecule object where the underlying Atom and Bond are new objects instead of references to.

simplesect.para: A new Molecule object with copied values

briefdescription.para: Number of rotatable bonds between heavy (= non-hydrogen) atoms.
